info.name: Blackstar - Hotstar Black Theme
info.description: Black Theme on hotstar.com Features: - Full Black Theme - No hotstar watermark in videos - Works on mobile view - Dark scrollbars - No facebook like button under the videos If you find any bugs, comment below and let me know.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.10 - 08 May 2019
- Responsive Fixes
- Fixes when logged out and not on premium
- Dark scrollbars
- Text selection styles
- Dark Snackbar 

Version 1.0.5 (Tested on 03 May 2019)
- Removed hotstar watermark in fullscreen mode
- Removed FB Like Button under the video
- A11y Color Fixes

Version 1.0.2 (Tested on 30 Apr 2019)
- Replaced hotstar logo with white one
- Dropdown hover color fix

Version 1.0.0 (Tested on 30 Apr 2019)
- Initial Release
